pages.text: The Chillager is an illager that wields formiddable ice magic - manifesting itself as a giant boulder of ice that gets hurled on my head. The ice is plenty freezing and slows me down, and it hurts, to be sure.$(br2)Besides that, the Chillager does not seem to possess other methods of offense.
Their distinctive attire: a cozy blue cloak and cape, with striking blue face markings.

pages.title: Cryomancy
pages.text: It would seem that the Chillager's powers lie within this wand; I can now gain my own mastery over the powers of cryomancy.$(br2)Using this wand will allow me to hurl my own ice boulders at whatever feels like having a bad time with me.

pages.name: Ice Boulder
pages.text: These ice boulders will follow their target until it crashes down on my foe. Frosty!
